page.title: 14CRAFTS OF HOLMER GREEN
page.content: Mrs.D Beaumont has been doing tambor for over 60 years.Tambor is to embroider in a tambor frame.It is a skilled job working with sequins and cotton ,finely stitching on to materials.She always designs her own work.Mrs.Beaumont makes purses, hats, wedding accessories, and belts.She has made dresses for filmstars such as Ginger Rodgers.Stuart King makes miniture chairs, large, lifesize chairs and even a miniature of a miniature chair.He has been doing this for 18 years .A good deal of his chairs are copies of old designs.One of his chairs was made for his grandfather in 1908.It takes from 3 to 30 hours to make a chair.Sometimes he makes smaller tools to make the miniature chairs.
